dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic and technology coexisted, the kingdom of Eldoria was on the brink of war.

dialogues.speaker: King Arin
dialogues.text: My dear subjects, we must defend our land against the dark forces that seek to destroy us. We will not go quietly into the night!

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I sense a great darkness gathering on the horizon. It is unlike anything I've ever seen before.

dialogues.speaker: King Arin
dialogues.text: Eira, your counsel is invaluable. What do you propose we do to counter this threat?
